name: GitHub
description: A platform for version control and collaboration. GitHub lets developers work together on projects from anywhere in the world.

name: Stack Overflow
description: A public Q&A site for programmers. Find solutions to coding problems and share knowledge with a community of developers.

name: MDN Web Docs
description: Comprehensive documentation for web developers. Includes detailed information on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Web APIs.

name: Figma
description: A collaborative interface design tool that's available in the browser. Create, test, and share designs with your team.

name: ChatGPT
description: An AI language model that can assist with writing, coding, learning, and more through natural conversation.

name: Notion
description: An all-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, wikis, and databases. Organize your work and life in one flexible tool.

name: Product Hunt
description: A platform to discover the latest mobile apps, websites, and technology products. Find daily features and trending tech.

name: Trello
description: A visual tool for organizing your work and life. Trello's boards, lists, and cards help teams manage projects collaboratively.

name: Perplexity AI
description: An AI language model that can assist with various tasks, mostly used due to web browsing capabilities, also can be used without an account.

name: DuckDuckGo
description: Popular search engine that focuses on privacy and anti-data collection.

name: Emalm
description: A neat free video and image upload website, does not require an account.

name: Imgur
description: Well known website for uploading images free and without an account.

name: Discord
description: One of the most popular social media applications, focused towards gamers and community driven audience.

name: AlternativeTo
description: Discover great apps, websites, and tools that are similar to what you're already using.

name: Wolfram Alpha
description: A computational knowledge engine that answers factual queries directly by computing the answer from curated data.

name: Libgen
description: A file-sharing website for scientific journal articles, books, and images.

name: Internet Archive
description: A non-profit library of millions of free books, movies, software, music, websites, and more.

name: Have I Been Pwned
description: Check if your email address has been compromised in a data breach.

name: DeepL
description: An AI-powered translation tool that offers highly accurate and natural-sounding translations.

name: Canva
description: A graphic design platform that makes it easy to create professional-looking visuals.

name: Grammarly
description: An AI-powered writing assistant that helps you write clearly and effectively.

name: Overleaf
description: A collaborative, online LaTeX editor for writing and publishing scientific documents.

name: Radio Garden
description: Explore live radio stations from around the world.

name: CamelCamelCamel
description: Track Amazon prices and get alerts when products go on sale.

name: Remove.bg
description: Automatically remove the background from images.

name: JustWatch
description: Find out where to watch movies and TV shows streaming online.

name: Ninite
description: Download and install multiple Windows programs at once, without any bloatware.

name: ToffeeShare
description: Share files of any size directly from your browser, with no storage limits.

name: PrivNote
description: Send self-destructing messages that disappear after being read.

name: Down for Everyone or Just Me
description: Check if a website is down for everyone or just you.

name: A Soft Murmur
description: Create a relaxing ambiance with customizable ambient sounds.

name: OldMapsOnline
description: View a wide variety of historical maps throughout a large timeline.
